acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill POJOs and interface attributes if a full constructor sets the interface attribute value
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillPojoInterfaceAttributeIfFullConstructorSetsItsValue

test-step.description: Given a Podam Factory with external factory
When I invoke the factory to manufacture <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.PojoWithInterfaces with the fullest constructor
Then the Object should not be null
Then the two objects 2 and 2 should be equal
Then the two objects interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ObjectExt and interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ObjectExt should be equal
Then the two objects interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.InterfacePojo and interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.InterfacePojo should be equal
Then the two objects 2 and 2 should be equal
